alert.note: Alert for Fillmore (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 9:59PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Fillmore County through 1015 PM CDT... At 958 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over extreme northeast Fillmore County, or 18 miles southeast of York, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Fillmore County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
